LightningComponentBundle.description: Form you can use to search for an organisation. Use this in for example a Flow

property.name: tradeName
property.label: Trade Name
property.description: The name the users uses to search. For the Netherlands the trade name.

property.name: street
property.label: Street
property.description: The street the users uses to search

property.name: houseNumber
property.label: House Number
property.description: The house number the users uses to search

property.name: houseNumberAddition
property.label: House Number Addition
property.description: The house number addition the users uses to search. Only used when the country is the Netherlands

property.name: city
property.label: City
property.description: The city the users uses to search

property.name: province
property.label: Province
property.description: The street the users uses to search. Only used if the selected country is France.

property.name: postalCode
property.label: Postal Code
property.description: The postal code the users uses to search

property.name: domainName
property.label: Domain Name
property.description: The domain name or email address the users uses to search. Only used when the country is the Netherlands

property.name: phoneNumber
property.label: Phone Number
property.description: The phone number the users uses to search. Only used when the country is the Netherlands

property.name: creditSafeId
property.label: CreditSafe Id
property.description: The credit safe unique company identifier the user uses to search.

property.name: registrationNumber
property.label: CreditSafe registration number
property.description: The registration number the user uses to search. Depending on the country this can be the number of the local Chamber of Commerce or the VAT number (e.g. Belgium)

property.name: vatNumber
property.label: VAT Number
property.description: The VAT number the user can search for. Not used in case of a.o. the Netherlands

property.name: status
property.label: CreditSafe status (Active/non-Acive(
property.description: Indicator if the company is economically active. Not used for the Netherlands.

property.name: registrationType
property.label: CreditSafe registration type (Ltd/non-Ltd)
property.description: Indicator if this company has limited
